eligibility.notes: In-app + 7-ELEVEN COD; opened ~15h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: SNAD
snadResult.reason: The seller provided an incorrect key information – the screen was replaced.  The listing and chat never mentioned this.  The seller’s stated ‘Genuine Apple Part’ is a material mismatch, as the screen replacement is not disclosed.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-10567
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The seller provided an incorrect key information – the screen was replaced.  The listing and chat never mentioned this.  The seller’s stated ‘Genuine Apple Part’ is a material mismatch, as the screen replacement is not disclosed.
Decision: SNAD
Outcome: The buyer accepted the return and full refund, and the seller will provide a return label and reimbursement.
